messages.message: Dear Shen Shen,  I'm completely thrilled and over the moon, my brother in law got me a ticket.  When he called me on Wednesday, I just couldn't believe my ears.   Is that real that I finally can go to your 9.29  hz concert, this so surrealğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‡  I was doing business trip in Shanghai , so I just arranged the late flight to Hong King on Friday night, and the early train to Shen Zhen.  I feel I was running to you in the blue sea and it worthsâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸ particularly we were all got wet by the rain. As you said the rain only made this memory more preciousâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸we absolutely will not forget each otherğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜˜ Love you alwaysï¼ï¼â¤ï¸â¤ï¸

My dear Shen Shen, you always thank us and remind us to take care of ourselves, and you should do the same too!! Just be yourselfâ€”no matter what decisions you make or what things you do, we will unconditionally support you! Go for it! You'll go further and further!

messages.message:
Unfortunately, I wonâ€™t be able to attend domestic tours in any near future due to my health conditions. But Iâ€™m truly glad to see you having so much fun and support back in China. 
Iâ€™m just here to invite you to consider Boston, US as one of your world tour stops haha! You are becoming a kind of mental support for me during my ongoing struggle with illness, and being able to attend a concert without long travel would be a big help. But promise me, do take care of yourself first, sincerely.
